reviewText: A great documentary about a man who started with little, made his way up the ranks to General, First Consul and the Emperor. His life on St Helena was mixed with pleasure with Betsy Belcombe and despair of not being able to see his son ever again and not to be able to have control of the rest of his life being a captive by the British. I also know the gentleman who plays Napoleon, so it is another reason to like this doco.
